    Rooms

    Casa Mathilda has 3 kind of rooms depending on their location inside the house.

    Select your room

  • Terrace
  • Interior
  • Street
    • Details

    Rooms to the Terrace

    Our most beautiful rooms that lead out to a terrace are filled with sunlight. They invite you to relax and enjoy the peace of your holidays. No hurry lo leave the hotel!

    Book
    • All rooms with private bathroom (shower or bathtube)
    • Air-conditioning / heating
    • Blankets and towels 100% cotton
    • Bathrobe and slippers
    • Double bed 160/180x200 ( or 2 singles under availability)
    • Natural fibre-Matresses with Topper for an extra comfort
    • Heater/towel -drier in all rooms
    • Hair dryer
    • Thermostatic Shower
    • Eco-Natural amenities from Rituals
    • Mini-bar and safe
    • TV with International channels
    Details

    Rooms facing Inside

    If you want to enjoy to the maximum the unlimited possibilities that Barcelona offers and come to the hotel just to charge up with energy this is a good option for you. They all have window but are not the most bright rooms of the house.

    Book

    Rooms facing the street

    If you want to feel the rhythm of the city while in thew hotel , this is your room. Just prefect for a well deserved break accompanied by a glass of wine while you nose around through their wide windows.

    Book
    • All rooms with private bathroom ( shower or bathtube)
    • Air-conditioning / heating
    • Blankets and towels 100% cotton
    • Double bed 160/180x200 ( or 2 singles under availability)
    • Natural fibre-Matresses with Topper for an extra comfort
    • Heater/towel -drier in all rooms
    • Hair dryer

    • Mini-bar and safe

    Info

    Casa Mathilda is a Boutique B&B  situated in Barcelona Eixample Area, a Smart neighbourhood and close to La Pedrera and La Sagrada Familia. The hotel is located on the main floor of a stately building which used to belong to one of the most prominent Catalan textile-manufacturing families in the early 20th century. It has been renovated in 2014 in a modern-elegant and  light vintage style , with a first quality finishing details.

    We take care of all details as Mathilda would do, for you to feel like being at your own home. Our breakfast includes our traditional “Pa amb tomaquet” with Jam, cheese or “fuet” . Croissants , Small varied pastries. All type of coffee, Tea, Yoghourt, cereals, different type of bread from the famous bakery Baluard, butter and Jam. Fruit Juice and Fresh Fruit every day. If you need something special please ask us, we will try to provide any special request.

    We also offer the option of COMPLETE BOOKING, in which you can rent the entire house – All for you! (subject to availability). Email or phone us with your inquiries or requirements.

    Services

    • We clean rooms daily
    • Free Wi-fi in the rooms and in all areas
    • Air contitioning / heating in rooms and in comunal areas
    • Security cameras in the  comunal areas
    • Handicaped accesible room
    • We have a crib for babies on request. Children up to age 2 stay for free
    • The entire inside the hotel is Non-smoking
    • The luggage consignment service is open during reception time
    • All Windows are sound-proof
    • The telephone in the rooms allows national and emergency calls
    • Bike rental
    • Tourist information, ticket sales and restaurant reservations
    • Reception open from 08:30h to 20:30h
    • Check- in: 15h - Check-out: 12:00h

    Casa Mathilda is a personal Project that start in my passion for travelling. Meeting people and other cultures has always been something very interesting for me. In an almost unconscious way, you can perceive the imprint that Mathilda has left on me throughout my life: the way she puts the heart in every single thing she does, her wisdom of making everyone happy and her infinite generosity. This is our spirit when welcoming our guests, sharing and personalizing in everyone’s interest, to make their experience unique, and wishing them to feel as comfortable as at their home, as comfortable as in Mathilda’s home.

    — Assumpta Baldó

    Casa Mathilda is a personal Project that start in my passion for travelling. Meeting people and other cultures has always been something very interesting for me. In an almost unconscious way, you can perceive the imprint that Mathilda has left on me throughout my life: the way she puts the heart in every single thing she does, her wisdom of making everyone happy and her infinite generosity. This is our spirit when welcoming our guests, sharing and personalizing in everyone’s interest, to make their experience unique, and wishing them to feel as comfortable as at their home, as comfortable as in Mathilda’s home.

    Latest News

    Empezamos de nuevo

    Hemos aprovechado los meses de invierno para tomarnos un descanso del todo merecido.  Aunque sólo a medias, ya que siguiendo nuestra filosofía de seguir mejorando cada día , hemos aprovechado el parón  para  restaurar junto con nuestra comunidad la fachada interior del edificio y así tener definitivamente la terraza impecable.

    From the moment you arrive until the moment you leave you are dealt with in a professional kind manner Everything you need is to hand and nothing is too much trouble, superb!

    Contact

    Phone: +34 935321600

    Email: info@casamathilda.com

    If you have any questions, suggestions or requests, please get in touch with us. You can fill out this form or phone us. We will be happy to hear from you and have the opportunity to help you or to improve. Thank you in advance for your interest!

    By contacting us you're accepting our Privacy Policy.

    How to Get There

    Roger de Lluria, 125-127

    Barcelona

    Metro Diagonal L3 and L5 - Metro Verdaguer L4 and L5

    From the airport:

    T1: Aerobus to Plaza de Catalunya + Metro stop Diagonal (40 minutes)

    T2: Train to Passeig de Gracia station + walk 10 minutes (40 minutes)

    Taxi: 20 minutes from the airport
